content.data:
[Y]Rant Column
[W]Cheeky opinions, zero apology.
[c][m.]
[W]Saying old machines are pointless
[W]misses the point of learning under
[W]constraints.
[W]The CPC teaches structure, discipline
[W]and timing better than many modern
[W]toys.
[c][m.]
[G]- Limits sharpen code.
[G]- Byte budgets force design.
[G]- Clarity beats bloat.
[m][m-]
[Y]RANT
[C]If your game only works with luck, it
[C]is not finished.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
